alert.note: Alert for Letcher (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 5:30AM EDT until July 28 at 2:39PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson KY has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Kentucky... North Fork Kentucky River at Whitesburg affecting Letcher County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Kentucky River at Whitesburg. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:30 AM EDT Thursday the stage was 8.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 10.8 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.0 feet on 04/04/1977. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. The next statement will be issued by 10 AM this morning.
